findings.rationale: Capping liability to the total contract value may expose a party to significant losses beyond that limit.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability is limited to the total contract value, except for indemnification obligations.

findings.rationale: Capping indemnification at annual contract value may not cover all potential claims, especially in case of significant negligence.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify the other for claims arising from its own gross negligence or willful misconduct, capped at annual contract value.

findings.rationale: A 45-day notice period for termination may lead to operational disruptions without sufficient time to adjust.
findings.evidence_quote: Either party may terminate for convenience with 45 days written notice.

findings.rationale: A 5-year confidentiality obligation may be insufficient for certain types of sensitive information.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations continue for 5 years after termination of this Agreement.
